page.title: 08ECOLOGY
page.content: The residents of Woodthorpe generally enjoy living in its peaceful atmosphere. In the Spring and Summer seasons the area is at its best with every street and house having a wide variety of colour from trees and shrubs. Late Spring brings out the blossom on the trees producing beautiful colour and sweet smelling perfume. The gardens of the houses have a wonderful selection of almost every cultivated flower that will grow in the area. It truly lives up to its name of a garden village. The cultivation of the gardens is a source of pride and they are well looked after.It is a neat, healthy and pleasing environment in which to live.
